T02D3112:207a-1: a'arya sarba ta th'a ga toshn'i sha si t'a ta
T02D3112:207a-2: pa tre n'a ma aa pa r'a dzi ta s'a
T02D3112:207a-5: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug
T02D3112:207a-6: tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo'i gzungs kyi sgrub
T02D3112:207a-7: thabs / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3112:207a-8: dge slong dge tshul dag bsnyen dang //
T02D3112:207a-9: rnal 'byor bde bzhi'i tshul ldan pas //
T02D3112:207a-10: sa gzhi bkra shis yid 'ong bar //
T02D3112:207a-11: mandal ba yi rnam lngas byugs //
T02D3112:207a-12: sa yi cho ga legs byas la //
T02D3112:207a-13: thig ni rab tu gdab par bya //
T02D3112:207a-14: 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi rtsibs bcu pa //
T02D3112:207a-15: rdo rje phreng ba gru chad dang //
T02D3112:207a-16: snam bu dang ni gru bzhir bya //
T02D3112:207a-17: padma sna tshogs phreng ba dang //
T02D3112:207a-18: rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor bar bya //
T02D3112:207a-19: tsandan shug pa la sogs pa //
T02D3112:207b-0: zhi dang rgyas pa'i shing rnams @207b la ;
T02D3112:207b-1: / gtsug tor rgyal mtshan ldan pa bya //
T02D3112:207b-2: de la sngags rnams legs par bri //
T02D3112:207b-4: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta /
T02D3112:207b-5: aom shtom bandha bandha bdag la raksha raksha sv'a h'a /
T02D3112:207b-6: aom h'um shtom bandha bandha bdag la raksha raksha sv'a h'a /
T02D3112:207b-7: aom badzra p'a ni h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3112:207b-8: aom ratna ta th'a ga toshn'i sha aa na aa
T02D3112:207b-9: ba lo ke te m'u rta ni te dzo ra
T02D3112:207b-10: shi h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3112:207b-11: aom padma dzva la dzva la /
T02D3112:207b-12: dha ka dha ka / dha ra dha ra /
T02D3112:207b-13: bi da ra bi da ra /
T02D3112:207b-16: h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3112:207b-17: aom karma sarba ta th'a ga toshn'i sha si t'a ta pa trem h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3112:207b-20: aa na le aa na le /
T02D3112:207b-21: kha sa me kha sa me /
T02D3112:207b-25: aa dhishth'a na aa dhishtha te sarba ta th'a ga
T02D3112:207b-26: toshn'i sha si t'a ta pa tre h'um phat sv'a
T02D3112:207b-27: h'a / h'um ma ma h'um ni sv'a h'a /
T02D3112:207b-29: aom ri shi ga na pra sha ste sarba ta
T02D3112:207b-30: th'a ga toshn'i sha si t'a ta pha tre h'um
T02D3112:207b-31: dr'um / dzambha ni ka r'i h'um dr'um /
T02D3112:207b-33: sam bhaksha na ka r'i h'um dr'um /
T02D3112:207b-34: pa ra bi dy'a sam bhaksha na ka r'i h'um tr'um /
T02D3112:207b-36: stambha ni ka r'i h'um dr'um /
T02D3112:207b-37: sarba yaksha r'aksha sa gra h'a n'an /
T02D3112:207b-38: bi dhva na sa na ka r'i h'um dr'um /
T02D3112:207b-39: tsa tu ra shi'i t'i n'an /
T02D3112:207b-40: gra ha sa ha sr'a n'a ma bi dhva na sa na ka r'i h'um dr'um /
T02D3112:207b-43: pra s'a dha na ka r'i h'um dr'um /
T02D3112:207b-44: aasht'a n'am ma h'a gra h'a n'am /
T02D3112:207b-45: bi dha na sa na ka r'i h'um dr'um /
T02D3112:207b-47: rim bzhin gtsug tor bzhugs su gsol //
T02D3112:207b-48: gru chad mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi //
T02D3112:207b-49: sgo bzhi sgo ba phur bu bzhi //
T02D3112:207b-50: rig sngags phreng bas bskor te gzugs //
T02D3112:207b-51: sgo bzhir ral gri me long dang //
T02D3112:207b-52: bum pa mda' dang rim bzhin brgyan //
T02D3112:207b-53: kha dog lnga yi rgyan rnams dang //
T02D3112:207b-54: yungs kar la sogs 'bru lnga bkod //
T02D3112:207b-56: rig sngags gcod cing mtshams bcad de //
T02D3112:207b-57: yan lag bdun pa'i smon lam gdab //
T02D3112:207b-58: phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs thams cad la //
T02D3112:207b-59: bdag la dbang bskur smon lam gdab //
T02D3112:207b-60: gnang ba thob nas sngags 'di brjod //
T02D3112:207b-61: aom ma h'a sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'atma konyham /
T02D3112:207b-62: de yis thams cad stong pa'i dang //
T02D3112:207b-65: phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun //
T02D3112:207b-66: ram gyis bsregs te yam gis gtor //
T02D3112:207b-67: kham gis bkrus la dag par byas//
T02D3112:208a-1: yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor chags //
T02D3112:208a-2: kham las bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho'i dbus //
T02D3112:208a-3: lam las gser gyis gzhi chags //
T02D3112:208a-6: rin chen sna tshogs ri rab ste//
T02D3112:208a-7: bhr'um las sna tshogs gzhal yas khang //
T02D3112:208a-8: gru bzhi sgo bzhi sgo khyung ldan //
T02D3112:208a-9: sna tshogs rdo rje padmas bskor //
T02D3112:208a-10: dbus su bhr'um las 'khor lo ni //
T02D3112:208a-11: rtsibs bzhi rtsibs bcu nyi zla'i bar //
T02D3112:208a-13: ge sar dbus su bsam pa ni //
T02D3112:208a-14: rigs kyi gtsug tor lnga rnams dang //
T02D3112:208a-15: phyogs bcu'i gtsug tor bcu rnams dang //
T02D3112:208a-16: sgo bzhir gtsug tor chen po bzhi //
T02D3112:208a-17: thams cad yi ge bhr'um las bskyed //
T02D3112:208a-18: sems can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D3112:208a-19: yid kyi rang bzhin nam mkha' ste //
T02D3112:208a-20: gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems //
T02D3112:208a-21: phyi nang snod bcud 'jig rten khams //
T02D3112:208a-22: 'byung lnga ye shes lnga rang bzhin //
T02D3112:208a-23: thams cad stong gsal rang bzhin med //
T02D3112:208a-25: de yi dkyil du yi ge aa //
T02D3112:208a-27: thams cad par bu gseg shang gis //
T02D3112:208a-28: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bkang ste //
T02D3112:208a-31: mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan //
T02D3112:208a-32: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan //
T02D3112:208a-33: gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu ste //
T02D3112:208a-34: thugs ni ye shes lnga dang ldan //
T02D3112:208a-35: de 'dra bde bar gshegs pa'i skus //
T02D3112:208a-36: nam mkha' bar snang sa gzhi rnams //
T02D3112:208a-37: til gang bzhin du gang bar bsgom //
T02D3112:208a-38: de dag dbu yi gtsug tor las //
T02D3112:208a-39: bhr'um las gtsug tor gdugs dkar mo //
T02D3112:208a-40: zhal gcig phyag bzhi zhi ba'i tshul //
T02D3112:208a-41: rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02D3112:208a-42: dang po phreng ba rgyal mtshan bsnams //
T02D3112:208a-43: 'og ma skyabs sbyin mnyam gzhag can //
T02D3112:208a-44: thugs kar bde gshegs gtsug tor ni //
T02D3112:208a-45: sku mdog ser po dbu rgyan 'khor lo bsnams //
T02D3112:208a-46: shar phyogs rdo rje gtsug tor ni //
T02D3112:208a-47: sku mdog dkar po rdo rje dril bu bsnams //
T02D3112:208a-48: lho phyogs rin chen gtsug tor ni //
T02D3112:208b-0: sku mdog sngo skya rin @208b chen nor bu bsnams //
T02D3112:208b-1: nub phyogs chos kyi gtsug tor ni //
T02D3112:208b-2: sku mdog dmar skya padma bum pa bsnams //
T02D3112:208b-3: byang phyogs las kyi gtsug tor ni //
T02D3112:208b-4: sku mdog ljang ser rgya gram lcags kyu bsnams //
T02D3112:208b-5: de lnga thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas //
T02D3112:208b-6: bhr'um las gtsug tor chen po bcu //
T02D3112:208b-7: dkar sngo dmar ljang mthing ga dang //
T02D3112:208b-8: sngo skya dmar nag kha dog bcu //
T02D3112:208b-9: rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02D3112:208b-10: kun kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa //
T02D3112:208b-11: g-yas pa gtsug tor g-yon bum pa //
T02D3112:208b-12: re re ra 'khor yang bcu bcus bskor //
T02D3112:208b-14: brjid pa'i tshul du mnyam gnas te //
T02D3112:208b-15: phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams kyis //
T02D3112:208b-16: dbang bskur yi ge thig le bkod //
T02D3112:208b-18: spyi bo lce dang snying ga dang //
T02D3112:208b-19: lte ba gsang ba'i gnas rnams so //
T02D3112:208b-20: sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las lngas //
T02D3112:208b-21: byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho 'phrul lo //
T02D3112:208b-23: spyi bo rna ba g-yas g-yon dang //
T02D3112:208b-24: ltag pa dbral ba dag tu dgod //
T02D3112:208b-25: 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen dang //
T02D3112:208b-26: padma rgya gram phyag mtshan sogs //
T02D3112:208b-27: rigs kyi bdag pos dbang bskur ba'i cho 'phrul lo //
T02D3112:208b-28: rdzogs pa'i sku mchog thugs ka nas //
T02D3112:208b-31: lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril //
T02D3112:208b-32: tshad med sgo ba chen mo bzhi //
T02D3112:208b-33: byams pa snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms so //
T02D3112:208b-34: dh'u pe pushpe a'a lo ke / gandhe mchod pa'i lha mo bzhis //
T02D3112:208b-35: bde gshegs kun la mchod par dmigs ;
T02D3112:208b-36: / byams pa'i lha mos bdug pa dbul //
T02D3112:208b-37: snying rje'i lha mos me tog dbul //
T02D3112:208b-38: dga' ba'i lha mos mar me dbul //
T02D3112:208b-39: btang snyoms lha mos byug pa dbul //
T02D3112:208b-40: so so'i sku mchog tshim nas kyang //
T02D3112:208b-42: lha mo de dag thams cad kyis //
T02D3112:208b-43: mig dang rna ba sna lce lus //
T02D3112:208b-45: gzugs sgra dri dang ro reg bya //
T02D3112:208b-46: gzugs kyi lha mos spyan la mchod //
T02D3112:208b-47: sgra yi lha mo snyan la mchod //
T02D3112:208b-48: dri yi lha mos shangs la mchod //
T02D3112:208b-49: ro yi lha mos ljags la mchod //
T02D3112:209a-2: thams cad 'phros te bdag la thim //
T02D3112:209a-3: gnyis su med pa'i mchod pa'i cho 'phrul lo //
T02D3112:209a-4: de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor du spyan drang ba ni //
T02D3112:209a-6: rgyal ba gang bzhugs 'khor dang bcas //
T02D3112:209a-7: gtsug tor chen po 'khor bcas rnams //
T02D3112:209a-9: ae hye hi bha ga b'a na /
T02D3112:209a-10: ma h'a k'a ru ni ka dri shya ho /
T02D3112:209a-13: pra dzny'a p'a ra mi t'a sarba ta th'a ga toshn'i sha si t'a ta pa tre h'um /
T02D3112:209a-14: rgyal ba 'khor bcas chur gshegs gdan la bzhugs //
T02D3112:209a-15: rin chen stegs dang seng ge'i khri //
T02D3112:209a-16: nyi zla padma brtsegs pa'i gdan //
T02D3112:209a-17: ma nyams tshul khrims brtan pa'i gnas 'dir bzhugs //
T02D3112:209a-19: srid gsum ston pa mi dang lha yi lha //
T02D3112:209a-20: bcom ldan mgon po sh'akya seng ge yi //
T02D3112:209a-21: mthon mthing g-yas su 'khyil pa'i spyi gtsug na //
T02D3112:209a-22: ya mtshan rmad byung gtsug tor gdugs dkar sku //
T02D3112:209a-23: srid gsum 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3112:209a-24: de nas rnam lnga rim bzhin dbul //
T02D3112:209a-25: bcom ldan sh'akya thub pa yi //
T02D3112:209a-26: dbu rgyan rin chen gtsug tor las //
T02D3112:209a-27: thugs rjes sprul pa'i gtsug tor gdugs dkar sku //
T02D3112:209a-28: zhal gcig mche gtsigs ye shes gdong mig can //
T02D3112:209a-29: phyag bzhi rigs bzhi nyon mongs bdud bzhi 'joms //
T02D3112:209a-30: rang bzhin rgyas pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3112:209a-31: ye shes dbu stong kha dog cir yang gsal //
T02D3112:209a-32: phyag ni 'bum phrag sprul pa'i phyag mtshan rnams //
T02D3112:209a-33: thugs rje go cha cis kyang mi thub gsal //
T02D3112:209a-34: 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags thugs rje nyi ma ltar //
T02D3112:209a-35: thugs rje 'bar ba'i 'od zer kun la khyab //
T02D3112:209a-36: rigs sngags drag po phra med tshogs 'joms shing //
T02D3112:209a-37: log 'dren bgegs kyi tshogs rnams 'dul mdzad pa //
T02D3112:209a-38: log pa'i skyon rnams sel la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3112:209a-39: sh'akya thub pa lcags kyi dkyil 'khor te //
T02D3112:209a-40: nyi zla padma'i lte dbus su //
T02D3112:209a-41: bhr'um las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa //
T02D3112:209a-42: gsang sngags 'dis ni legs par bskor //
T02D3112:209b-1: aom aa na le aa na le /
T02D3112:209b-2: pi sha de bi sha de /
T02D3112:209b-4: badzra ngha ra ni bandha bandha /
T02D3112:209b-5: badzra p'a ni h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3112:209b-6: h'um dr'um bandha h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3112:209b-7: zhi rgyas dbang drag mngon spyod rnams //
T02D3112:209b-9: sngags re yungs kar re rer sprul//
T02D3112:209b-10: bcad dam bskrad nas phur bus rdeg / rin chen lnga sogs bum pa la //
T02D3112:209b-11: khro bo'i lha rnams bsgom byas te //
T02D3112:209b-12: khrus kyi cho ga legs par bya //
T02D3112:209b-13: gtsang ba'i gos kyis rab brgyan te //
T02D3112:209b-14: shar phyogs sgo nas phyag 'tshal bshags //
T02D3112:209b-15: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis //
T02D3112:209b-19: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
T02D3112:209b-20: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag
T02D3112:209b-21: bdun nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams
T02D3112:209b-23: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
T02D3112:209b-24: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan rgyas pa
T02D3112:209b-25: autpa la bsung gi tog gi rgyal po la phyag
T02D3112:209b-26: 'tshal lo // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D3112:209b-27: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D3112:209b-28: rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3112:209b-29: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
T02D3112:209b-30: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du bzang
T02D3112:209b-32: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
T02D3112:209b-33: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che
T02D3112:209b-34: tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3112:209b-35: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
T02D3112:209b-36: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa
T02D3112:209b-38: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
T02D3112:209b-39: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas s'a la'i dbang
T02D3112:209b-40: po'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa la
T02D3112:209b-41: phyag 'tshal lo // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
T02D3112:209b-42: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
T02D3112:209b-43: rgyas sman gyi bla bee d'urya 'od kyi rgyal po
T02D3112:210a-0: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa @210a * //
T02D3112:210a-1: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3112:210a-2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
T02D3112:210a-3: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med
T02D3112:210a-5: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
T02D3112:210a-6: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i
T02D3112:210a-7: sde mtshon cha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3112:210a-8: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3112:210a-9: rdo rje'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3112:210a-10: nor bu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3112:210a-12: glang po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3112:210a-13: gzhon nu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3112:210a-15: 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3112:210a-16: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3112:210a-17: lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3112:210a-18: phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3112:210a-19: 'jig rten na yang dag par spong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3112:210a-20: lha'i drang srong dmod pa 'dor ba dang /
T02D3112:210a-21: phan 'dogs nus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3112:210a-22: rig sngags 'dzin grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3112:210a-25: legs ldan drag po dka' thub zlog pa'i bdag po dang lhan cig pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3112:210a-26: legs ldan sred med kyi bu phyag rgya chen po lngas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3112:210a-27: legs ldan nag po grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jig par
T02D3112:210a-28: byed pa dur khrod na gnas par mos pa ma
T02D3112:210a-29: mo'i tshogs kyis phyag byas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal
T02D3112:210a-30: lo // bum pa rgyan ldan lnga rnams la //
T02D3112:210a-31: gtso bo'i sngags rnams legs brjod cing //
T02D3112:210a-32: brgya rtsa brgyad du brjod par bya //
T02D3112:210a-33: dbang bskur bsrung ba'i tshig 'di brjod //
T02D3112:210a-34: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas
T02D3112:210a-35: byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub
T02D3112:210a-36: ma phyir bzlog pa chen mos /
T02D3112:210a-37: dus thams cad du bdag la dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlab tu gsol //
T02D3112:210b-0: aom dus @210b gsum bde gshegs sprul pa'i sku //
T02D3112:210b-1: gzhan gyis mi thub drag shul che //
T02D3112:210b-2: gtum pa chen mo stobs chen mo //
T02D3112:210b-3: 'bar ba chen mo gzi brjid che //
T02D3112:210b-4: dkar mo chen mo stobs chen mo //
T02D3112:210b-5: 'bar ba'i phreng ba gos dkar mo //
T02D3112:210b-6: 'phags ma sgrol ma khro gnyer can //
T02D3112:210b-7: rgyal ba'i rdo rje phreng zhes grags //
T02D3112:210b-8: padmas mngon mtshon rdo rjes mtshan //
T02D3112:210b-9: gzhan gyis mi thub phreng ba can //
T02D3112:210b-10: rdo rje mkhar bsnams 'joms pa mo //
T02D3112:210b-11: drag po'i lha rnams thams cad kyis //
T02D3112:210b-12: bdag la srung bar mdzad du gsol //
T02D3112:210b-13: zhi ba'i lha rnams kyis mchod ma //
T02D3112:210b-14: gzugs zhi gzi brjid chen mo can //
T02D3112:210b-15: 'phags ma sgrol ma stobs chen mo //
T02D3112:210b-16: rdo rje lu gu rgyud gzhan dang //
T02D3112:210b-17: rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin ma //
T02D3112:210b-18: lag na rdo rje rigs gser phreng //
T02D3112:210b-19: le brgan rtsi dang rin chen ma //
T02D3112:210b-20: snang mdzad rdo rje gtsug tor grags //
T02D3112:210b-21: rnam par bsgyings ma'i rdo rje dang//
T02D3112:210b-22: gser 'od lta bu'i spyan mnga' ma //
T02D3112:210b-23: rdo rje sgros dang dkar mo dang //
T02D3112:210b-25: phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag thams cad kyis /
T02D3112:210b-26: bdag la srung bar mdzad du gsol /
T02D3112:210b-27: de nas phyogs bcu'i gtsug tor rnams kyis dbang bskur /
T02D3112:210b-29: aom ri shi ga na pra shasta ya ta th'a
T02D3112:210b-30: ga toshn'i sha si t'a ta pa tre h'um dr'um
T02D3112:210b-33: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can /
T02D3112:210b-34: rdo rje gtsug tor phyir bzlog pa chen mo /
T02D3112:210b-35: phyag stong mnga' ba chen mo /
T02D3112:210b-36: dbu stong mnga' ba chen mo /
T02D3112:210b-37: spyan bye ba brgya stong mnga' ba /
T02D3112:210b-38: mi phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can /
T02D3112:210b-39: rdo rje yangs pa chen mo sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la mnga' mdzad pa /
T02D3112:210b-40: kun nas bdag la bsrung du gsol //
T02D3112:210b-41: 'jigs pa chen mo nyi shu las bsrung du gsol ;
T02D3112:210b-42: / gdon nyi shu rtsa gcig las bdag rgyal bar mdzad du gsol /
T02D3112:210b-43: sha za'i gdon sum cu rtsa gcig las bdag bsrung du gsol /
T02D3112:210b-44: gdon de dag thams cad kyi rig sngags bcad do //
T02D3112:210b-46: kun du rgyus byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do //
T02D3112:211a-1: mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro mas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do //
T02D3112:211a-3: phyug bdag chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do //
T02D3112:211a-5: sred med kyi bus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do //
T02D3112:211a-7: nam mkha' lding dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do //
T02D3112:211a-9: nag po chen po dang ma mo'i tshogs kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do //
T02D3112:211a-11: mi'i thod pa can gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do //
T02D3112:211a-13: rgyal bar byed pa dang sbrang rtsir byed pa dang
T02D3112:211a-14: don kun grub pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do
T02D3112:211a-16: sring mo bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do //
T02D3112:211a-18: bhring gi ri ti dang dga' byed dbang phyug dang /
T02D3112:211a-20: lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do //
T02D3112:211a-22: dge sbyong gcer bus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do //
T02D3112:211a-24: dgra bcom pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do //
T02D3112:211a-26: 'dod chags dang bral bas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do //
T02D3112:211a-28: gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do //
T02D3112:211a-30: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas
T02D3112:211a-31: byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can khyod la phyag 'tshal
T02D3112:211a-32: lo // bdag la bsrung du gsol /
T02D3112:211a-34: aom aa si t'a na l'arka pra bh'a sphu ta
T02D3112:211a-35: bi ka si t'a ta pa tre dzva la dzva
T02D3112:211a-38: bi dha ra bi dha ra /
T02D3112:211a-41: h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3112:211a-46: aa pra ti ha t'a ya phat /
T02D3112:211a-48: aa su ra bi dr'a ba na ka r'a ya phat /
T02D3112:211a-51: sarba aa su re bhya: phat /
T02D3112:211a-52: sarba ma ru te bhya: phat /
T02D3112:211a-53: sarba ga ru de bhya: phat /
T02D3112:211a-55: sarba kin na re bhya: phat /
T02D3112:211a-56: sarba ma ho r'a ge bhya: phat /
T02D3112:211b-1: sarba pi sh'a tse bhya: phat /
T02D3112:211b-4: sarba p'u ta ka tra ne bhya: phat /
T02D3112:211b-5: sarba aun m'a de bhya: phat /
T02D3112:211b-6: sarba aa pasma re bhya: phat /
T02D3112:211b-7: sarba aosta r'a ge bhya: phat /
T02D3112:211b-8: sarba dur lam ki te bhya: phat /
T02D3112:211b-9: sarba dur bhukshi te bhya: phat /
T02D3112:211b-11: sarba kri te karma ni ka khor de ki ra na /
T02D3112:211b-12: bhi ta tsi ta pre sha ka dhutstsha dhi te dur bhug te bhya: phat /
T02D3112:211b-14: sarba shra ma ne bhya: phat /
T02D3112:211b-15: sarba bidy'a dha re bhya: phat /
T02D3112:211b-18: sarba aartha s'adha ke bhyo bidy'a tsarye bhya: phat /
T02D3112:211b-19: tsa tur bhyo bha gi ni bhya: phat /
T02D3112:211b-20: sarba ku m'a ri ba de tra pa ni ye bhya: phat /
T02D3112:211b-21: ma h'a pra tyam gi re bhya: phat /
T02D3112:211b-22: badzra shr'im kha la pra tyam gi ra r'a dza ye phat /
T02D3112:211b-23: ma h'a k'a l'a ya ma tri ga na na ma skri te ye phat /
T02D3112:211b-27: ma h'a k'a l'i ye phat /
T02D3112:211b-35: k'a la r'a tri ye phat /
T02D3112:211b-38: aa ti mukti shm'a sh'a b'a si n'i ye phat /
T02D3112:211b-39: dkyil 'khor lha yi snam bu la //
T02D3112:211b-40: mchod pa sna lnga brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02D3112:211b-41: phyogs bzhir nyi shu lnga lnga dgod //
T02D3112:211b-42: sgo khyud snam bu ljang gu'i steng //
T02D3112:211b-43: drag po'i dug shing sna tshogs la //
T02D3112:211b-44: phur ba tshad ldan brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02D3112:211b-45: lnga bcu rtsa drug rig sngags bri //
T02D3112:211b-46: phyogs rer nyi shu rtsa lnga dgod //
T02D3112:211b-47: byad ma'i phyogs su gdon rnams kyi //
T02D3112:211b-48: gzugs ming gro ga la bris te //
T02D3112:211b-49: phyag rgya bzhis ni bkug bcug nas//
T02D3112:211b-50: phur bus gdab cing sngags kyis gdab //
T02D3112:211b-51: bskul tshig bcas pa'i bzlas pa ni //
T02D3112:211b-52: brgya rtsa brgyad du brjod par bya //
T02D3112:211b-54: yul phyogs bcas pa'i ming rus bris //
T02D3112:211b-55: cho ga bzhin du phur bus gdab //
T02D3112:211b-56: bud med gang zhig bu 'dod pas ;
T02D3112:211b-57: / dag cing gtsang mar khrus byas nas //
T02D3112:211b-58: zhi ba'i rgyan dang ldan par bya //
T02D3112:211b-59: gtsug tor snying po 'bum phrag brjod //
T02D3112:211b-60: byis pa'i gdon rnams phur bus gdab //
T02D3112:211b-61: yul dang grong khyer srung 'dod pas //
T02D3112:212a-2: mchod pa'i cho ga bcu bcu bya //
T02D3112:212a-3: gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du brjod //
T02D3112:212a-4: grong khyer gtso bo dbus su ni //
T02D3112:212a-5: gtsug tor gtso bo lnga bzhabs ta //
T02D3112:212a-6: dkyil 'khor chen po rgyas par bya //
T02D3112:212a-7: gzungs kyang 'bum tshar gdon par bya //
T02D3112:212a-8: de ltar lan bdun byas gyur na //
T02D3112:212a-10: thams cad gcod bzlog rig sngags 'di //
T02D3112:212a-11: ston pas sngon sangs rgyas tshe gsungs //
T02D3112:212a-12: gzhan yang 'di yi yon tan ni //
T02D3112:212a-13: bye ma snyed du brjod mi lang //
T02D3112:212a-15: bsod nams thams cad bskyed pa dang //
T02D3112:212a-16: rkyen rnams thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir //
T02D3112:212a-17: rdo rje lta bu'i sgrub thabs 'di //
T02D3112:212a-18: shes rab ldan pas rtogs par shog / gtsug tor gdugs dkar mo'i sgrub thabs /
